EntryName	ADH1G_HUMAN
ProteinName	Alcohol dehydrogenase 1C (EC 1.1.1.1) (Alcohol dehydrogenase subunit gamma)
GeneName	ADH1C ADH3
Length	375
Function	Alcohol dehydrogenase. Exhibits high activity for ethanol oxidation and plays a major role in ethanol catabolism.
Subcellular Location	Cytoplasm
